hooks.command: bash -c 'echo "=== Multi-Project Status ==="; for d in C:/dev/01_projects/*/; do echo; echo "$(basename $d):"; git -C "$d" log --oneline -2 2>/dev/null | head -2; git -C "$d" status -s 2>/dev/null | head -3; done'
bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // empty"); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "(CLAUDE\.md|docs/.*\.md|master_prompt\.md)"; then echo "⚠️  중요 파일 변경. /sync 권장"; fi'

bash -c 'DIRTY=0; for d in C:/dev/01_projects/*/; do if git -C "$d" status --porcelain context/STATE.md 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then echo "⚠️ $(basename $d): STATE.md 미커밋. /sync 필요"; DIRTY=1; fi; done; if [ $DIRTY -eq 1 ]; then echo "BLOCK: /sync 실행 후 종료하세요"; exit 1; fi'
